attributes.action: End Means Testing the EMA - Education Maintenance Award (£30.00 currently) and provide support to all Students who wish to continue into higher Eduction
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PLEASE SUPPORT THIS IMPORTANT PETITION SO THAT ALL STUDENTS ARE TREATED EQUALLY
You may not be aware that the Government provides £30.00 per week to SOME STUDENTS who choose to continue higher education, the AWARD(EMA) is means tested against Parents earning(why?), this is prejudicial against most middle class students, as STUDENTS who do not receive the award have to WORK to earn the £30.00 per week others get as a right, therefore putting them on an unequal educational footing - THIS Government thinks PARENTS can afford to give their children the £30 instead - THIS IS NOT TRUE!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
